name: Eurogamer - Dark Theme
description:
Applies a Visual Studio-esque dark theme to Eurogamer.net.

This is just a quick first stab at it, I'll add additional tweaks as I find things that need to be changed. Feel free to let me know on Twitter (@ObsidianDev) if there's anything glaring that needs a look.
additional_info:
31/05/2018
 - Fixed white borders at sides.

27/03/2018
 - Set Archive Subtitle to white text
 - Fixed Aside colours
 - Fixed Image Captioning colours
 - Fixed "More About" section colours
 - Applied theme to forum
 - Applied theme to search results page
